entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
